author: chirino
msg: Don't hold on the root page referece. Just load the root page from
the page file every time and assume that the PageFile is going
to do the proper caching for us.

author: chirino
msg: Updated the Index interface so that a Transaction is passed to the load and unload methods.
This allows the initialization and shutdown to be done as part of a larger unit of work.
HashIndex resizing is now done in the context of a transaction so it simplified tremendously as
it does not need to worry about a partial resize operation occuring.
Also added BTreeVisitor class that I forgot to add in a previous commit.

author: manugeorge
msg: Fix for OPENEJB-907 Element <jndi> possibly ignored in openejb-jar.xml.In org.apache.openejb.config.EjbJarInfoBuilder.initJndiNames method the first line should be
